sourcing.instructions: Co: Metal supply stores or online suppliers; Cr: Metal supply stores; P: Chemical suppliers; Y: Rare earth material suppliers.
steps: Co: Metal supply stores or online suppliers; Cr: Metal supply stores; P: Chemical suppliers; Y: Rare earth material suppliers.
1. Weigh out 320 g of cobalt (Co) and place in a mixing container.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh out 320 g of cobalt (Co) and place in a mixing container.

steps: 1. Transfer the mixture into a crucible suitable for high-temperature applications.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixture into a crucible suitable for high-temperature applications.

steps: 1. Allow the crucible to cool down naturally to room temperature (approximately 1-2 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. Allow the crucible to cool down naturally to room temperature (approximately 1-2 hours).

steps: 1. Remove the solid sample from the crucible.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Remove the solid sample from the crucible.
